attributes.action: The mayor of our capital city London should be voted in by the whole country.
attributes.additional_details: As the capital of the country it should be the decision of the whole country to change Londons mayor for the better.
attributes.background: Have a vote for the whole country to decide who is the mayor of London our capital city.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Grant the vote for London Mayor to all UK Residents" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/715511
